Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.utils

Class Action

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.utils.Action
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Action extends Object implements Serializable
The Action is the object used to send serialized data regarding the game through the network
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Action()
    Creates an empty action that can be filled and be sent through the network to play
